nodes.text: B-wing starfighters were a type of heavy assault starfighter used primarily as an attack vessel against capital ships and escorting other fighter squadrons and convoys.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance used A/SF-01 B-wing starfighters in many battles, including the Battle of Endor. The New Republic used them at the Battle of Jakku. During the First Order/Resistance War, the Resistance used a newer variant at the Battle of Exegol. They were well armed with heavy lasers and targeting lasers on all three wingtips. All three wings would fold in flight and retract to the fixed wing on the side during landing.[source?]
